mapper.select: SELECT a.id as announcement_id, a.group_id, a.title, a.content, a.pin, a.created_at, a.updated_at, u.id AS publisher_id, -- UserBriefResponse 字段 u.username AS publisher_username, u.nickname AS publisher_nickname, u.avatar AS publisher_avatar_url FROM group_announcements a JOIN users u ON a.publisher_id = u.id WHERE a.group_id = #{groupId} ORDER BY a.pin DESC, -- 置顶优先 a.created_at DESC -- 时间倒序

SELECT a.id as announcement_id, a.group_id, a.title, a.content, a.pin, a.created_at, a.updated_at, u.id AS publisher_id, -- UserBriefResponse 字段 u.username AS publisher_username, u.nickname AS publisher_nickname, u.avatar AS publisher_avatar_url FROM group_announcements a JOIN users u ON a.publisher_id = u.id WHERE a.id = #{announcementId} AND a.group_id = #{groupId}

SELECT * FROM group_announcements WHERE group_id = #{groupId} AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND status = 1 ORDER BY pin DESC, created_at DESC

SELECT ga.*, u.username, u.nickname, u.avatar FROM group_announcements ga JOIN users u ON ga.publisher_id = u.id WHERE ga.group_id = #{groupId} AND ga.status = 1 ORDER BY ga.pin DESC, ga.created_at DESC
